content.description:
William M. "Boss" Tweed: "As long as I count the votes, what are you going to do about it?"

Fotosearch/Getty Images
content.question: Which of the following changes to the United States during the nineteenth century most directly contributed to the development depicted in the image?

choices.label: The dismantling of the national bank
The acquisition of territory in the West
The rise of the Peopleâ€™s (Populist) Party

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
